faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Simple answers about how ProofOnSite works on real construction sites.

q1.question: Do delivery crews need accounts or apps?
q1.answer: No. They scan the QR code with their phone camera and immediately see a photo upload form. No account, no password, no app download required. Works on any smartphone.

q2.question: How fast can I get started?
q2.answer: Less than 5 minutes. Sign up, create your first site, add an address, then download your QR code. Print it and you're ready to track deliveries.

q3.question: Who gets notified when a delivery arrives?
q3.answer: You receive an instant email with the photos, timestamp, and site reference. You can also add CC emails (suppliers, clients, project managers) who will get the same notification automatically.

q4.question: Can I export my delivery records?
q4.answer: Yes. All delivery photos and data can be exported for your archives, reports, or accounting. Your data always remains yours and accessible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how ProofOnSite collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
• Account information (name, email, password)
• Site information (site names, addresses, reference codes)
• Delivery photos and metadata (timestamps, capture tokens)
• Usage data (login times, features used)

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use your information to:
• Provide and maintain the ProofOnSite service
• Process and store delivery photos
• Send service notifications and updates
• Improve our service and develop new features
• Respond to your support requests

storage.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
storage.content:
Your data is stored securely using:
• Neon PostgreSQL for structured data (encrypted at rest)
• Vercel Blob for photo storage (secure CDN delivery)
• Industry-standard encryption for data in transit (TLS/SSL)
• Secure session-based authentication

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, but no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only:
• With service providers who assist in operating our platform (hosting, storage)
• When required by law or to protect our rights
• With your explicit consent

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. When you delete your account, we will delete your personal data and delivery photos within 30 days, except where retention is required by law.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Delete your account and data
• Export your data
• Object to data processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at hello{'@'}proofonsite.com

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use third-party tracking cookies or analytics that collect personal information.

international.title: 8. International Users
international.content: ProofOnSite is hosted on servers located in North America. By using our service, you consent to the transfer and processing of your data in Canada and the United States.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: ProofOnSite is not intended for users under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice on our website.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at hello{'@'}proofonsite.com
